title: feat(dashboard): add model usage by tier panels
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Added detailed model usage panels to the internal economics dashboard to track consumption by user tier.
gist.impact: Provides the team with granular visibility into which models are driving costs across Nectar, Flower, Seed, and Spore tiers.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee analyzing data charts on a retro computer monitor, with icons representing the different tiers (flower, seed, spore).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot analyzing colorful bar charts on a retro computer monitor. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Pixel icons of flowers and seeds on the screen. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot analyzing colorful bar charts on a retro computer monitor. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Pixel icons of flowers and seeds on the screen. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.
